actions.text: Amendment SA 3105 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Amendment SA 3105 proposed by Senator McCain to Amendment SA 3048. (consideration: CR S4661-4662; text: CR S4661) To provide for an exception for voice and other services over the Internet.l
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3105 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3105 proposed by Senator McCain to Amendment SA 3048.

amends_amendment.purpose: To extend the moratorium on taxes on Internet access and multiple and discriminatory taxes on electronic commerce imposed by the Internet Tax Freedom Act for 4 years, and for other purposes.

purpose: To provide for an exception for voice and other services over the Internet.l
